Created aliquots of RNA Pico Ladder received on 20191101, per the manufacturer's instructions. Created single-use aliquots of 1.5uL and stored at -80<sup>o</sup>C:

- [Rack 2, Column 3, Row 4](http://b.link/srlab-80C)

I verified that the ladder looks good by running a blank RNA Pico 6000 chip on the 2100 Bioanalyzer (Agilent) in the Seeb Lab.
